actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to terminate the authorization for the Meramec Park Lake, Missouri, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Terminates the authorization of the Meramec Park Lake flood control project, Missouri. Directs the Secretary of the Army, through the Chief of Engineers, to: (1) take no action to dispose of works or lands; (2) maintain project lands and structures pending further disposition by Congress; (3) investigate what manner of disposition and future utilization of the lands and structures best serves the public interest; and (4) report the results of such investigation to Congress. Authorizes the use of the funds from the deauthorized project to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to terminate the authorization for the Meramec Park Lake, Missouri, and for other purposes.
